# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $150, reflecting its true worth and the opportunity for you to experience its benefits. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
